widget.name: DataviewLoader
widget.description: Change the loading experience to the user to just load parts of the page with the usage of this widget.

property.caption: Result page
property.description: The page to load and display. Result page or Result page mf are required.

property.caption: Result page mf
property.description: Will be used if filled instead of the selected form. Result page or Result page mf are required.

property.caption: Reload on refresh
property.description: When the dataview object is refreshed, the Microflow will be triggered again.

property.caption: Reload on attribute
property.description: On which attribute changes must the reload be triggered?

property.caption: Fade in content
property.description: When the content has been loaded, must there be a fade in executed?

property.caption: Visibility handling
property.description: Is the widget placed in conditional visibility part (example: Tabpage)? This check will prevent for loading the content before the widget is visible.

property.caption: Microflow
property.description: Optional microflow to execute the hard work. If the microflow isn't configured, the dataview object will be passed to the Result page.

property.caption: Asynchronous call
property.description: Must the microflow be executed asynchronous? If yes, only the dataview object can be used for the Result page, because the Return entity is passed to the widget by Mendix.

property.caption: Return entity
property.description: The entity to return via the Microflow when the Asynchronous call is false. (optional; required when defining a Microflow)

property.caption: Show error text
property.description: When the microflow fails, must there be a custom text visible for the user? Otherwise the loader will be visible.

property.caption: Error text
property.description: Text that is visible when the microflow fails in execution.
